    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static LinEqCons
    LinEqCons.equalitiesToInequalities(LinEqCons lec)
    Transforms equality constraints Ax = b into a set of equivalent inequalities: Ax <= b and -Ax <= -b.
    static LinEqCons
    MaxEntModel.getDefaultLEC(String inDir)
    Generates the default linear equality constraint: composition-1 + 2(digest-1).
    static LinEqCons
    MaxEntOptim.getDefaultLEC(String inDir)
    Generates default constraints for the MaxEnt problem.
    static LinEqCons
    LinEqCons.removeLastRow(LinEqCons lec)
    Removes the last row (constraint) from a LinEqCons object.
